questions.question: How can I modify my booking details?
questions.answer: You can modify your booking details by logging into your account and going to the 'My Bookings' section. Select the booking you want to modify and click 'Edit'. Please note that some modifications may be subject to additional fees depending on the service provider's policy.

questions.question: Can I cancel my booking and get a refund?
questions.answer: Yes, you can cancel your booking according to the cancellation policy specified at the time of booking. Refund terms vary depending on the type of service and the time remaining before the travel date. For a full refund, it is recommended to cancel at least 48 hours before the trip date.

questions.question: What payment methods are available?
questions.answer: We accept all major payment methods including credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express), debit cards, and digital wallets such as Apple Pay and Google Pay. All transactions are secure and encrypted to protect your financial information.

questions.question: How do I contact customer service?
questions.answer: You can contact us through several channels: phone at +966 123 456 789, email at support@gulf-tourism.com, or live chat on the website. Our customer service team is available 24/7 to assist you with any inquiries.
